active_blockers.title: GSC API data not yet pulled
active_blockers.description: Google Search Console is verified (per PROJECT-CONTEXT.md) but no baseline metrics have been pulled. Phase 1 tasks 'Pull baseline metrics from GSC/GA4' and 'Complete technical SEO audit' are blocked until first data pull is done. No .seo/data/ directory or data files exist.

active_blockers.title: GA4 data not yet pulled
active_blockers.description: GA4 is active on the site (G-G6C4G1SQ44) and confirmed working in health check, but no analytics data has been pulled into the SEO tracking system. Need traffic, bounce rate, session duration, and top pages data to establish baselines.

active_blockers.title: No Google Site Verification meta tag in source
active_blockers.description: PROJECT-CONTEXT.md says GSC is 'Verified' but no google-site-verification meta tag was found in layout.tsx or any public HTML file. Verification may have been done via DNS/CNAME or GA4 method, but this should be confirmed. If verification lapses, GSC data access will be lost.

new_blockers.title: No Google Site Verification meta tag found in codebase
new_blockers.description: GSC verification method is unclear. No google-site-verification meta tag in layout.tsx. Should confirm how GSC was verified (DNS, HTML tag, GA4, or Tag Manager method) to ensure it remains verified after any future changes.
new_blockers.recommended_action: Confirm GSC verification method with Charwin. If HTML tag method was intended, add the meta tag to layout.tsx.

phase_1_foundation.blocked_reason: Waiting on first GSC and GA4 data pulls (BLK-001, BLK-002)

summary: Two high-priority blockers remain from initial setup: GSC and GA4 data have not been pulled yet, preventing Phase 1 completion. The site itself is healthy (SSL valid, sitemap present with 150+ URLs, robots.txt configured, all key pages returning 200). One new medium-severity blocker identified: no google-site-verification meta tag found in the codebase -- GSC verification method should be confirmed to ensure ongoing access. No pending approvals. Phase 1 cannot progress to baseline metrics, technical audit, or quick wins until data sources are connected and first pulls are completed.
